name: Rintorfer
description:
Rintorfer is a game, that most of its gameplay is/will_be focusing on stealth/strategy/exploring. Inspired by the retro ps1 grapchics style. This demo, is just a showcase of the main game mechanics...

[Story]

There is a story, however explaining it might work just as same as spoiler.

[Controls]

w a s d -> move

ctrl -> crouch

space - jump

[menu]

up down -> move in menu

escape -> back in menu

enter -> choose

[other versions]
